pageContext.claim: “You know what they don't tell you about windmills? After 10 years, they look like hell. You know, they start to get tired, old. You got to replace them. A lot of times, people don't replace them. They need massive subsidy from the government in order to make it.”
pageContext.analysis: All power-generating infrastructure requires maintenance. The lifespan of a wind turbine is 20 to 25 years.
